verbs.description: [V: attack] ad slams gov scott for wearing navy hat it is well - known rick scott loves wearing his navy hat but now it is at the center of a war of words in a new political attack ad gov scott frankie larry ahearn senate fox u s colonel evelio otero u s justice department navy fraud fox pitt kelton cochran caronia waller rick scott florida attack gov scott bill nelson clearwater hca evelio otero jr
